name: 2D - 3D Platformer
description:
Hi there! This is the first game I made in Unity and Bolt.

It's very much unfinished, with horrible controls and bad level design (singular), but hey, I thought I'd put it up anyway to have a sort-of record of where I started.

It made it in ~1 week to learn to use both Unity and Bolt and I think it's pretty decent for a first try :)

You can also download the Bolt scripts down below.
